blocks.name: df-ssr
blocks.content: Define the subsets class or the class of subset relations. Similar to definitions of epsilon relation ( ~ df-eprel ) and identity relation ( ~ df-id ) classes. Subset relation class and Scott Fenton's subset class ~ df-sset are the same: ` _S = SSet ` (compare ~ dfssr2 with ~ df-sset ), the only reason we do not use ~ dfssr2 as the base definition of the subsets class is the way we defined the epsilon relation and the identity relation classes. The binary relation on the class of subsets and the subclass relationship ( ~ df-ss ) are the same, that is, ` ( A _S B <-> A C_ B ) ` when ` B ` is a set, see ~ brssr . Yet in general we use the subclass relation ` A C_ B ` both for classes and for sets, see the comment of ~ df-ss . The only exception (aside from directly investigating the class ` _S ` e.g. in ~ relssr or in ~ extssr ) is when we have a specific purpose with its usage, like in case of ~ df-refs versus ~ df-cnvrefs , where we need ` _S ` to define the class of reflexive sets in order to be able to define the class of converse reflexive sets with the help of the converse of ` _S ` . The subsets class ` _S ` has another place in set.mm as well: if we define extensional relation based on the common property in ~ extid , ~ extep and ~ extssr , then "extrelssr" " |- ExtRel _S " is a theorem along with "extrelep" " |- ExtRel _E " and "extrelid" " |- ExtRel _I ". (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 25-Jul-2019.)

blocks.name: dfssr2
blocks.content: Alternate definition of the subset relation. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 9-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfssr2() {
  |- wceq(cssr, cdif(cxp(universe, universe), crn(cxrn(cep, cdif(universe, cep)))))
} = {
  3eqtr4ri(cssr, cdif(cxp(universe, universe), crn(cxrn(cep, cdif(universe, cep)))), copab(hs1, hs2, wn(wex(hs0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, cep), cv(hs2)))))), copab(hs1, hs2, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))
  opabbii(hs1, hs2, wn(wex(hs0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, cep), cv(hs2))))), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))
  bitr4i(wn(wex(hs0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, cep), cv(hs2))))), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wn(wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))))))
  notbii(wex(hs0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, cep), cv(hs2)))), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))))
  exbii(hs0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, cep), cv(hs2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))))
  anbi12i(wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, cep), cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  epel(hs1, cv(hs0))
  xchbinx(wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, cep), cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs2)))
  brvdif(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs2))
  epel(hs2, cv(hs0))
  dfss6(hs0, cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  eqtri(cdif(cxp(universe, universe), crn(cxrn(cep, cdif(universe, cep)))), copab(hs1, hs2, wn(wex(hs0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, cep), cv(hs2)))))), cdif(cxp(universe, universe), copab(hs1, hs2, wex(hs0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, cep), cv(hs2)))))))
  difeq2i(cxp(universe, universe), crn(cxrn(cep, cdif(universe, cep))), copab(hs1, hs2, wex(hs0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, cep), cv(hs2))))))
  rnxrn(hs1, hs2, hs0, cep, cdif(universe, cep))
  vvdifopab(hs1, hs2, wex(hs0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, cep), cv(hs2)))))
  df-ssr(hs1, hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(hs2))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(cep)
  diff.hs1.c(cdif(universe, cep))
  diff.hs2.c(cep)
  diff.hs2.c(cdif(universe, cep))
  diff.hs0.c(cep)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(universe, cep))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dfssr2() {
  ⊢ _S =((𝕌 × 𝕌)\ ran((∈ |X.(𝕌 \ ∈))))
} = {
  3eqtr4ri(cssr, ((𝕌 × 𝕌)\ ran((∈ |X.(𝕌 \ ∈)))), { < hs1, hs2 > | ¬ ∃(hs0,(hs0[∈]hs1 ∧ hs0[(𝕌 \ ∈)]hs2))}, { < hs1, hs2 > | hs1 ⊆ hs2 })
  opabbii(hs1, hs2, ¬ ∃(hs0,(hs0[∈]hs1 ∧ hs0[(𝕌 \ ∈)]hs2)), hs1 ⊆ hs2)
  bitr4i(¬ ∃(hs0,(hs0[∈]hs1 ∧ hs0[(𝕌 \ ∈)]hs2)), hs1 ⊆ hs2, ¬ ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ hs2)))
  notbii(∃(hs0,(hs0[∈]hs1 ∧ hs0[(𝕌 \ ∈)]hs2)), ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ hs2)))
  exbii(hs0, (hs0[∈]hs1 ∧ hs0[(𝕌 \ ∈)]hs2), (hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ hs2))
  anbi12i(hs0[∈]hs1, hs0[(𝕌 \ ∈)]hs2, hs0 ∈ hs1, ¬ hs0 ∈ hs2)
  epel(hs1, hs0)
  xchbinx(hs0[(𝕌 \ ∈)]hs2, hs0 ∈ hs2, hs0[∈]hs2)
  brvdif(hs0, cep, hs2)
  epel(hs2, hs0)
  dfss6(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  eqtri(((𝕌 × 𝕌)\ ran((∈ |X.(𝕌 \ ∈)))), { < hs1, hs2 > | ¬ ∃(hs0,(hs0[∈]hs1 ∧ hs0[(𝕌 \ ∈)]hs2))}, ((𝕌 × 𝕌)\ { < hs1, hs2 > | ∃(hs0,(hs0[∈]hs1 ∧ hs0[(𝕌 \ ∈)]hs2))}))
  difeq2i((𝕌 × 𝕌), ran((∈ |X.(𝕌 \ ∈))), { < hs1, hs2 > | ∃(hs0,(hs0[∈]hs1 ∧ hs0[(𝕌 \ ∈)]hs2))})
  rnxrn(hs1, hs2, hs0, cep, (𝕌 \ ∈))
  vvdifopab(hs1, hs2, ∃(hs0,(hs0[∈]hs1 ∧ hs0[(𝕌 \ ∈)]hs2)))
  df-ssr(hs1, hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(cep)
  diff.hs1.c((𝕌 \ ∈))
  diff.hs2.c(cep)
  diff.hs2.c((𝕌 \ ∈))
  diff.hs0.c(cep)
  diff.hs0.c((𝕌 \ ∈))
}

blocks.name: relssr
blocks.content: The subset relation is a relation. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 1-Aug-2019.)

blocks.name: brssr
blocks.content: The subset relation and subclass relationship ( ~ df-ss ) are the same, that is, ` ( A _S B <-> A C_ B ) ` when ` B ` is a set. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 31-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm brssr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c2, cssr, c0), wss(c2, c0)))
} = {
  pm5.21nd(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c2, cssr, c0), wss(c2, c0), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)))
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c2, cssr, c0)), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c2, cssr, c0), wcel(c2, universe))
  brrelex1i(c2, cssr, c0)
  relssr()
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c2, cssr, c0))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)))
  jca(wa(wss(c2, c0), wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1))
  ssexg(c2, c0, c1)
  simpr(wss(c2, c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  brabg(hs0, hs1, c2, universe, c0, c1, cssr, wss(c2, c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(c2, cv(hs1)))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1))
  sseq2(cv(hs1), c0, c2)
  df-ssr(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c2, c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wss(c2, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm brssr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c2[_S]c0 ↔ c2 ⊆ c0))
} = {
  pm5.21nd(c0 ∈ c1, c2[_S]c0, c2 ⊆ c0, (c2 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c0 ∈ c1))
  jca((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2[_S]c0), c2 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ c1)
  adantl(c0 ∈ c1, c2[_S]c0, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  brrelex1i(c2, cssr, c0)
  relssr()
  simpl(c0 ∈ c1, c2[_S]c0)
  ancoms(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ⊆ c0, (c2 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c0 ∈ c1))
  jca((c2 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), c2 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ c1)
  ssexg(c2, c0, c1)
  simpr(c2 ⊆ c0, c0 ∈ c1)
  brabg(hs0, hs1, c2, universe, c0, c1, cssr, c2 ⊆ c0, hs0 ⊆ hs1, c2 ⊆ hs1)
  sseq1(hs0, c2, hs1)
  sseq2(hs1, c0, c2)
  df-ssr(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c2 ⊆ c0)
  diff.hs1.w(c2 ⊆ c0)
}

blocks.name: brssrid
blocks.content: Any set is a subset of itself. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 1-Aug-2019.)

blocks.name: issetssr
blocks.content: Two ways of expressing set existence. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 1-Aug-2019.)

blocks.name: brssrres
blocks.content: Restricted subset binary relation. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 25-Nov-2019.)

blocks.name: br1cnvssrres
blocks.content: Restricted converse subset binary relation. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 25-Nov-2019.)

blocks.name: brcnvssr
blocks.content: The converse of a subset relation swaps arguments. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 1-Aug-2019.)

blocks.name: brcnvssrid
blocks.content: Any set is a converse subset of itself. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 9-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: br1cossxrncnvssrres
blocks.content: ` <. B , C >. ` and ` <. D , E >. ` are cosets by range Cartesian product with restricted converse subsets class: a binary relation. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 9-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm br1cossxrncnvssrres(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7))), wb(wbr(cop(c0, c2), ccoss(cxrn(c8, cres(ccnv(cssr), c9))), cop(c4, c6)), wrex(s0, c9, wa(wa(wss(c2, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c8, c0)), wa(wss(c6, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c8, c4))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsc(s0, c9)
} = {
  syl6bb(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7))), wbr(cop(c0, c2), ccoss(cxrn(c8, cres(ccnv(cssr), c9))), cop(c4, c6)), wrex(s0, c9, wa(wa(wss(c2, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c8, c0)), wa(wss(c6, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c8, c4)))), wrex(s0, c9, wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(cssr), c2), wbr(cv(s0), c8, c0)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(cssr), c6), wbr(cv(s0), c8, c4)))))
  br1cossxrnres(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8, ccnv(cssr), c9)
  rexbii(s0, c9, wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(cssr), c2), wbr(cv(s0), c8, c0)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(cssr), c6), wbr(cv(s0), c8, c4))), wa(wa(wss(c2, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c8, c0)), wa(wss(c6, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c8, c4))))
  anbi12i(wa(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(cssr), c2), wbr(cv(s0), c8, c0)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(cssr), c6), wbr(cv(s0), c8, c4)), wa(wss(c2, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c8, c0)), wa(wss(c6, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c8, c4)))
  anbi1i(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(cssr), c2), wbr(cv(s0), c8, c0), wss(c2, cv(s0)))
  elv(s0, wb(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(cssr), c2), wss(c2, cv(s0))))
  brcnvssr(cv(s0), universe, c2)
  anbi1i(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(cssr), c6), wbr(cv(s0), c8, c4), wss(c6, cv(s0)))
  elv(s0, wb(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(cssr), c6), wss(c6, cv(s0))))
  brcnvssr(cv(s0), universe, c6)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, cssr)
  diff.cssr.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm br1cossxrncnvssrres(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)∧(c4 ∈ c5 ∧ c6 ∈ c7))→(< c0, c2 >[, ~((c8 |X.(`' _S |` c9)))]< c4, c6 > ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c9,((c2 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0[c8]c0)∧(c6 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0[c8]c4)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c7)
  ⊣ d(s0, c8)
  ⊣ d(s0, c9)
} = {
  syl6bb(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)∧(c4 ∈ c5 ∧ c6 ∈ c7)), < c0, c2 >[, ~((c8 |X.(`' _S |` c9)))]< c4, c6 >, ∃(s0 ∈ c9,((c2 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0[c8]c0)∧(c6 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0[c8]c4))), ∃(s0 ∈ c9,((s0[`' _S]c2 ∧ s0[c8]c0)∧(s0[`' _S]c6 ∧ s0[c8]c4))))
  br1cossxrnres(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8, `' _S, c9)
  rexbii(s0, c9, ((s0[`' _S]c2 ∧ s0[c8]c0)∧(s0[`' _S]c6 ∧ s0[c8]c4)), ((c2 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0[c8]c0)∧(c6 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0[c8]c4)))
  anbi12i((s0[`' _S]c2 ∧ s0[c8]c0), (s0[`' _S]c6 ∧ s0[c8]c4), (c2 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0[c8]c0), (c6 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0[c8]c4))
  anbi1i(s0[`' _S]c2, s0[c8]c0, c2 ⊆ s0)
  elv(s0, (s0[`' _S]c2 ↔ c2 ⊆ s0))
  brcnvssr(s0, universe, c2)
  anbi1i(s0[`' _S]c6, s0[c8]c4, c6 ⊆ s0)
  elv(s0, (s0[`' _S]c6 ↔ c6 ⊆ s0))
  brcnvssr(s0, universe, c6)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, cssr)
  diff.cssr.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: extssr
blocks.content: Property of subset relation, see also ~ extid , ~ extep and the comment of ~ df-ssr . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 10-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm extssr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wceq(cec(c0, ccnv(cssr)), cec(c2, ccnv(cssr))), wceq(c0, c2)))
} = {
  3bitr4g(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cec(c0, ccnv(cssr)), cec(c2, ccnv(cssr))), wceq(c0, c2), wal(hs0, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), cssr, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cssr, c2))), wal(hs0, wb(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c2))))
  albidv(hs0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), cssr, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cssr, c2)), wb(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c2)))
  bi2bian9(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wbr(cv(hs0), cssr, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cssr, c2), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c2))
  brssr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  brssr(c2, c3, cv(hs0))
  mp2an(wb(wceq(cec(c0, ccnv(cssr)), cec(c2, ccnv(cssr))), wal(hs0, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), cssr, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cssr, c2)))), wrel(cssr), wrel(cssr))
  relssr()
  releccnveq(hs0, cssr, cssr, c0, c2)
  ssext(hs0, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(cssr)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm extssr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→([c0]`' _S =[c2]`' _S ↔ c0 = c2))
} = {
  3bitr4g((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), [c0]`' _S =[c2]`' _S, c0 = c2, ∀(hs0,(hs0[_S]c0 ↔ hs0[_S]c2)), ∀(hs0,(hs0 ⊆ c0 ↔ hs0 ⊆ c2)))
  albidv(hs0, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), (hs0[_S]c0 ↔ hs0[_S]c2), (hs0 ⊆ c0 ↔ hs0 ⊆ c2))
  bi2bian9(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, hs0[_S]c0, hs0[_S]c2, hs0 ⊆ c0, hs0 ⊆ c2)
  brssr(c0, c1, hs0)
  brssr(c2, c3, hs0)
  mp2an(([c0]`' _S =[c2]`' _S ↔ ∀(hs0,(hs0[_S]c0 ↔ hs0[_S]c2))), Rel(_S), Rel(_S))
  relssr()
  releccnveq(hs0, cssr, cssr, c0, c2)
  ssext(hs0, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))
  diff.hs0.c(cssr)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
